commit_list.message: Only switch to chunked if we don't know the length of a file like object. This fixes the case of trying to upload a 0-length file - chunked upload was being forced. Services like S3 that disallow chunked upload will fail.

commit_list.message:
Working from dejuknow's mavericks-list-view branch, the TDimmableIconImageView draRect will now extract the file path from the FINode living as an instance variable on the super super view, which is a TListRowView, and use it to select the correct image from the IconCache.

The only obvious remaining todo is to figure out how to get the list view to repaint. I've tried invalidating the entire tree of subviews, which does not seem to work. Inspection via GDB suggests that the list view is backed by CALayer, which probably needs to be invalidated in some different manner.
commit_list.repo_description: Liferay Nativity is a cross-platform library for adding icon overlays and context menus to file browsers.

updated gitignore

Using the .rhtml extension got deprecated in 2007 and will no longer work in Rails 3. I have renamed all the view files

http://ryandaigle.com/articles/2007/2/21/what-s-new-in-edge-rails-rhtml-and-rxml-to-die-a-slow-and-painful-death

Update the raw SQL queries for admin chartin and revenue to work correclty on recent MySQL. Also modify the grouping to group by product code instead of product name - in the case that two products have the same name but different codes. Assuming that "code" is the unique key.
Update to the latest version of Google Analtyics tracking code
Freeze in Rails 2.3.10

Updates to bring Potion Store in line with Rails 2.3.10. The most notable is renaming controllers/application.rb to application_controller.rb and using the rake rails:update facilities to update boot.rb and environment.rb

Escape with CGI::escape instead of URI.escape

Since URI.escape does not percent encode [and is deprecated], everything after a string that contains an ampersand is lost.

commit_list.message: Big update to the rsync plugin, not currently backwards compatible with previous versions. On the mac configuration is now stored as json in ~/Library/Strongspace. Also, much much cleanup has been done with respect to the organization of all metadata and configuration stored for this plugin. In large part this is being driven by our GUI wrapped around all of the code and for the time being we aren't putting forth a huge effort to keep it backwards compatible until everything stabilizes a bit further.

commit_list.message:
Previously we would generate json for spaces and snapshots that looked like

{"spaces":
   [{"space" => {"name":"home","type":"normal","snapshots":0}},
    {"space" => {"name":"public","type":"public","snapshots":0}}]
}

which seems a bit silly. We now generate in the style

{"spaces":
   [{"name":"home","type":"normal","snapshots":0},
    {"name":"public","type":"public","snapshots":0}]
}
